message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $15,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your product is worth $14,000 to you, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $13,000 for your product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $13,500 is my final offer. This is still a good deal for you, as you value the product at $15,000. Let's close this deal!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still interested in your product, but I can only commit to $13,000. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
